entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 8:00 PM CST Sunday 08 January 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 84 %

Dewpoint: -14.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
